examples.description: uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes

examples.description: adds a :hover pseudo selector for navigation links with "nav a:hover"
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States adds a :hover pseudo selector for navigation links with "nav a:hover"

examples.description: adds a pseudo selector for hover with an underline via #header a:hover
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States adds a pseudo selector for hover with an underline via #header a:hover

examples.description: pads the questions div with 20px left and right via an element class selector of "div.questions"
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States pads the questions div with 20px left and right via an element class selector of "div.questions"

examples.description: styles h4 in div.questions with a font-size of 30px and bottom margin of 10px via a nested selector of "div.questions h4"
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States styles h4 in div.questions with a font-size of 30px and bottom margin of 10px via a nested selector of "div.questions h4"

examples.description: gives paragraphs in div.questions a top margin of 30px via a "div.questions p" selector
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States gives paragraphs in div.questions a top margin of 30px via a "div.questions p" selector

examples.description: makes links with class btn into blue button pills "div.questions a.btn"
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States makes links with class btn into blue button pills "div.questions a.btn"

examples.description: gives links with class btn into blue button pills with a hover state via "div.questions a.btn:hover"
examples.full_description: Styling Links with Pseudo Selectors and IDs for Hover States gives links with class btn into blue button pills with a hover state via "div.questions a.btn:hover"
